contextId.information: Where Jesus comes to can be made explicit. AT: "until Jesus comes back to the earth" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
This can be stated in active form. AT: "if God gives someone insight" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: if an insight is given to one
